name: 12 SECONDS AWAKE - TANKS FIGHT
description:
12 SECONDS AWAKE is an idea of mixing physics based war game with worms-like turn mechanics.

This is a game prototype and has to tell me what players does like in that game and what does not. Please, share your opinion with me :)

Btw. this game was made in Rust language and Oxygen game engine (https://github.com/PsichiX/Oxygengine)

Assets bought from Kenney
Game source code: https://github.com/PsichiX/Oxygengine/tree/master/demos/demo-web-game
